name: Percent Impervious Cover (BMP Runoff)
functionStatement: Runoff and infiltration sustain natural flow regime, carry appropriate sediment and nutrients from uplands, and reliably cue aquatic life processes.
descriptionMarkdown: Catchment land cover/soil condition used as a surrogate for runoff/infiltration and stress from development or land conversion.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Delineate watershed for the reach; compute metric from land cover/impervious (e.g., NLCD) and/or soils (NRCS). Apply the state SQT scoring breakpoints.

inputs.helpMarkdown: Watershed GIS (land cover/impervious/soils) and watershed delineation.

references: NRCS soils/curve number datasets where applicable
